thread.title: Golden Joystick Awards will stream exclusively on Twitch - Gaming
thread.title_full: Golden Joystick Awards will stream exclusively on Twitch - Gaming News - Digital Spy

author: Ben Lee
title: Golden Joystick Awards will stream exclusively on Twitch - Gaming
text: The Golden Joystick Awards will stream exclusively on Twitch.The games awards, organised by Future plc, have partnered with the social video platform to broadcast the ceremony on Friday, October 30. "We're delighted once again to be working with Twitch as an official partner of this year's awards," said Future plc's editor-in-chief of gaming. "There is no better platform for the Joysticks to be shown."We can't wait to join Twitch's millions of users all over the world in celebrating the games we love, voted for by the people who play them, at the Golden Joystick Awards."Chris Mead - Twitch's partnerships director, EMEA - added: "The Twitch community is passionate about consuming live gaming content from all over the world."By continuing our partnership with Future for the Golden Joystick Awards, we ensure our fans are able to view one of the industry's most popular award shows, regardless of where they are based." © Konami This year's Golden Joystick Awards will be hosted by Danny Wallace, while Julia Hardy will provide backstage access and exclusive interviews with the evening's winners.Each voter will receive a copy of BioShock Infinite for PC from digital distribution retailer Green Man Gaming. Voters will get a voucher code for BioShock Infinite for £1, but can earn the £1 back by playing the game.Voting closes at midnight on October 16, so head on over to the official hub to have your say.Check out our most anticipated games of October, one of many videos in Digital Spy's dedicated Gaming YouTube channel. Be sure to subscribe!
